message: I propose a fair split, 90% for me, 10% for you. Let's get this over with quickly.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 75/25 split in my favor.  Consider the devaluation - accepting now is in your best interest.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up 50% of the money. This is a 60/40 split in my favor. If you reject this, I'm sure you'll regret it.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering you 350,000 - that's more than you were offered last round even with the devaluation! Let's be smart and end this here before we both lose out more.
